properties.name: databaseTruncator.exclude
properties.description: All prefixes that must be excluded from the collection of tables that must be truncated.

properties.name: databaseTruncator.strategy
properties.description: Strategy to use for truncating. If no values is set, the platform default will be used.

properties.name: databaseTruncator.resetSequences
properties.description: Reset sequences can be automatically turned on. Note that this is an expensive database action. Default value is false.
